title: Soulstealer Ahri [Skin Concept]

My AS page:

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
http://imgur.com/4pqDwxw

This is a really awesome idea for a darker theme for Ahri! I love, love, love her tails! 

My only feedback would be, watch for gameplay issues regarding her Q (does she have her passive up yet? Blue v. green.) I'd also pop her through a colorblind mode filter in Photoshop, to make sure spells and her model aren't hard to see on Rift! 

As always, steller work with your concepts! <3

OMG *--*
Thank you for the tip, I will make some changes in her Q to become more visible
Thanks thanks <3
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Could the tails light up depending on stacks? She does have 9 of them.
Hmmm, maybe the next Ahri skin should do that ... I think she's getting a Pool Party skin.
Disco Ahri would be better suited to that.
That actually sounds amazing...

I know, once I wrote it down i was like
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

We gotchu covered fam! Obviously, there are several types of colorblindness, and we try to balance out the best we can for everyone, but, if you ever have an issue with something, feel free to @ me on the boards. :)
Tfw people say we don't need more Ahri skins, *but we actually do*.

Dat Giant Rasengan
https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/006/423/394/large/slown-damn-r.jpg?1498492024
This.. is an AMAZING concept. nice job! i would buy that!
Not a fan personally. Especially if it'd be as exclusive as SS Vayne, but it's quality, I'll give you that.

> [{quoted}](name=NineTailedMystic,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WHzLQEiP,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-06-26T22:28:08.595+0000)
>
> Especially if it'd be as exclusive as SS Vayne.

well Soulstealer Vladimir wasn't hextech exclusive. just because the Vayne one was, doesn't necessarily mean any future ones would be :P
i love it yet hate it at the same time everyone makes an ahri skin yet no one bothers with other champions :/
Why do her foxfires look like SSG icons?
As a resident Ahri plaything, I must say the Q and the R really are my favorite.
I could imagine her E being more of a claw.
Amazing, can you do one for shaco? :P

Gorgeous design!

Also adding more collection to Vladimir's ~~spooky harem~~ Soulstealer pals is always good.

You're fucking awesome dude, keep up the good work. I do hope riot considers implementing your concepts especially this one to an actual skin on the rifts. Just a quick tip though, give ass and tits 10/10 would top seller.
omg, i love it
looks beautiful and it's very appropriate for her backstory too. A+

Hey that's actually a good point.

Ahri right now dresses like a normal person but when she was going around eating a bunch of people she probably looked more evil. She was described as a demon at one time, Riot should make that skin where people saw her as a sort of demon.

Fuck Ahri btw.

I think that the tails need more polishing and wouldn't the passive look better if it had a darker purple color? It would allow her abilities to have green effects without confusion.

Good work tho, the model is really well made.

> [{quoted}](name=Daunt,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WHzLQEiP,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-06-26T22:45:20.781+0000)
>
> I think that the tails need more polishing and wouldn't the passive look better if it had a darker purple color? It would allow her abilities to have green effects without confusion.
> 
> Good work tho, the model is really well made.

Ty ^^, I think you're right.
VFX Updated guys! ;3

That is probably one of the best looking concepts so far of what could have been a skin for her.  (Even though she looks like Kalista)  The earliest that I have seen was a 2013 skin but it was just Foxfire with a different color scheme.
AhriKaiser?
So... regular Ahri?
This is what we've been wanting : , )
